body:
+ It appears that macOS related changes to the gcc recipe (PR #13202) broke gcc on RHEL7.  This bug manifests as `libstdc++.so: undefined reference to libiconv` when gcc is used.
+ Fixes #13452 by moving `--with-libiconv-prefix={0}'.format(spec['libiconv'].prefix)` into the darwin OS section of the configuration.
+ Also fixes #13391
+ Needs to be tested on macOS and other Linux flavors.
title: Fix gcc recipe for RHEL7.
